name: Corrupted Souls
description:
Each time you execute an undead mob, you will have a 30% chance to get a corrupted soul. When you get 50 souls, you will be able to right click in an Ancient City portal to exchange the souls for power (only avaliable 3 times).
- 1st time: Secondary Ability level up, 25% bonus Eldritch spell power and 15% bonus Eldritch spell resistance.
- 2nd time: Secondary Ability level up and bonus health, attack damage and armor.
- 3rd time: Secondary Ability level up and First Ability level up.
